price: Hao ni askari watao shindwa miongoni mwa makundi yatayo shindwa.
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
footnotes: Hao ni askari wanyonge walio shindwa, hapana hivi wala hivi, kama walivyo shindwa mfano kama wao walio jikusanya kuwapinga Manabii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
